ai-tha-ap456:2.2_0: I presented my men with respect.
ai-tha-ap456:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap456:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap456:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap456:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pukkusa.
ai-tha-ap456:7.1_0: with grass and chains, training, and fourth senior.
